Replying to @kentcdodds 2019-03-20 09:50
@kentcdodds 2 really good options that I like: 1. @zapier You can schedule webhooks: https://t.co/gtLs1sc4cK There is an official @Netlify integration: https://t.co/TIpKY0RjVH 2. @webtaskio You can configure a cron-like schedule to make requests to your Netlify Function. https://t.co/yWny5efZR2
